resources.string: Delux Room - Starting 500.00 AED OR 5000 PTS
Executive Suite - Starting 900.00 AED OR 9000 PTS

The 48 sqm. deluxe rooms surprise with sophistication. unwind with a spacious bathtub, 55-inch LED TV and premiunm bedding. Take it all in with views of Sharjahs sparkling lagoon. Refuel at any time with the coffee station and minibar. Or get down to bussiness with the workspace and seamless Wi-Fi access.

1. As per UAE law, guests are required to present an original, valid ID (UAE National ID) or Passport in order to have a smooth check-in. Please note that all Special Request are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
3.Meals are not included in the stay booking unless specified otherwise.
FLAT 50% DISCOUNT ON DENTAL CHECK UP
Flat 50% Discount on dental check up at Sabka Dentist. Free Dental check-up. Free X-ray.Free consultation. Teeth cleaning and polishing at Rs.300(original price at clinic Rs.675)
Payment will be made only through Paytm
Offer is valid only for one person, one sitting only.
Cannot be clubbed with any other offer
Offer can be used at any of the 110 Sabka dentist clinics across 6 cities.
To book appointment at any Sabka dentist clinics,call on 02264648484.
Pay with card and earn points
